description.value:
You maintain your combat prowess even when at a disadvantage.

Prerequisites: Str 11.

Benefit: The normal penalties to attack rolls from being @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.4AkWDHGM6gHDepHN]{Grappled}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.XgK4EdO5D3Fj3iWz]{Pinned}, and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.XeRGqHVtcZ7vsgJ0]{Prone} don’t apply to your unarmed attacks. The penalties from the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.XgK4EdO5D3Fj3iWz]{Pinned} condition don’t apply to your attempts to grapple your opponent or free yourself.
